original: yang na dri zhim po thams cad dang sbyar ba'i chu'i nang du gser ram dngul gang yang rung ba bsregs pas gsur la dro 'jam tsam du bsros pas bkru bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na dri zhim po thams cad dang sbyar ba'i chu'i nang du gser ram dngul gang yang rung ba bsregs pas gsur la dro 'jam tsam du bsros pas bkru bar bya'o //
translated: Or else, he should be bathed in water perfumed with all the sweet-smelling substances, and warmed by the steam of gold or silver heated to a pleasant temperature.

original: de nas mdzub mo g-yas pa ni //🔽dkris pas rkan ni bteg nas kyang //
analyzed: de nas mdzub mo g-yas pa ni // dkris pas rkan ni bteg nas kyang //
translated: Then, with the right index finger🔽enveloped in cotton wool, he should raise the palate

original: mgo bor ras bal snum can g-yogs //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mgo bor ras bal snum can g-yogs // zhes bya ba la /
translated: and cover the head with oiled cotton.

original: de'i 'og tu sman pa'i mdzub mo g-yas pa ras bal gyi ye'us dkris pas byis pa'i rkan legs par bteg la mgo bo'i steng nas ras bal snum gyis bkab cing g-yogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu sman pa'i mdzub mo g-yas pa ras bal gyi ye'us dkris pas byis pa'i rkan legs par bteg la mgo bo'i steng nas ras bal snum gyis bkab cing g-yogs par bya'o //
translated: After that, the physician should raise the palate of the child well with the right index finger enveloped in cotton wool, and cover and envelop the head with oiled cotton.

original: blo dang tshe dang stobs bskyed phyir //
analyzed: blo dang tshe dang stobs bskyed phyir //
translated: To increase intelligence, life, and strength,🔽he should be given a paste of long pepper,

original: shu dag pra ma bi sha li //🔽sham ka pushpa'i lde gu ni //
analyzed: shu dag pra ma bi sha li // sham ka pushpa'i lde gu ni //
translated: pramana, and shali rice,

original: mar dang sbrang rtsi bcas pa dag / sngags btab ha re nu tsam sbyin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mar dang sbrang rtsi bcas pa dag / sngags btab ha re nu tsam sbyin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: consecrated with mantras, the size of a jujube fruit, together with ghee and honey.

original: de nas byis pa de'i blo dang / tshe dang stobs bskyed pa'i phyir shu dag dang pra ma la sogs pa btags pa'i @91a * //
analyzed: de nas byis pa de'i blo dang / tshe dang stobs bskyed pa'i phyir shu dag dang pra ma la sogs pa btags pa'i @91a * //
translated: Then, in order to increase the child's intelligence, life, and strength, one should give him a paste of asafoetida, ginger, etc.

original: lde gu sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar ba ha re nu'i tshad tsam 'jag ma'i rtse mo la sngags kyis btab cing mngon par bzlas te /
analyzed: lde gu sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar ba ha re nu'i tshad tsam 'jag ma'i rtse mo la sngags kyis btab cing mngon par bzlas te /
translated: The size of a harītakī fruit, anointed with the tip of kuśa grass, enchanted and recited,

original: gser gyi snod du sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: gser gyi snod du sbyin par bya'o //
translated: in a golden vessel.🔽Gold, asafoetida, sapphire,

original: gser dang shu dag mu men dang // ma nu aa ru ra'i phye ma 'am //
analyzed: gser dang shu dag mu men dang // ma nu aa ru ra'i phye ma 'am //
translated: and the powder of manah-śilā and harītakī,🔽or the powder of gold and harītakī,

original: gser dang skyu ru'i phye ma dang // sbrang rtsi mar bcas lde gu sbyin //
analyzed: gser dang skyu ru'i phye ma dang // sbrang rtsi mar bcas lde gu sbyin //
translated: with honey and ghee, give the paste.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here it is said:

original: yang na gser la sogs pa phye mar btags pa sbrang rtsi dang lde gur sbyar ba 'am /
analyzed: yang na gser la sogs pa phye mar btags pa sbrang rtsi dang lde gur sbyar ba 'am /
translated: Or the powder of gold, etc., mixed with honey and made into a paste,

original: yang na gser dang skyu ru ra'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba gang yang rung ba de blo dang tshe dang stobs bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na gser dang skyu ru ra'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba gang yang rung ba de blo dang tshe dang stobs bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin par bya'o //
translated: or the powder of gold and harītakī mixed with ghee and honey, whichever is appropriate, should be given in order to increase intelligence, life, and strength.

original: de nas mngal chu rgyam tsha ni //
analyzed: de nas mngal chu rgyam tsha ni //
translated: Then, if the womb water is hot,

original: mar dang bcas pas skyug tu gzhug / ces bya ba la /
analyzed: mar dang bcas pas skyug tu gzhug / ces bya ba la /
translated: Then, with butter, induce vomiting.

original: de ltar lde gu de sbyin pa'i rjes la rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba'i mar byin la /
analyzed: de ltar lde gu de sbyin pa'i rjes la rgyam tsha dang sbyar ba'i mar byin la /
translated: After giving the gruel, give butter mixed with rock salt.

original: mngal gyi gnas na gnas pa'i tshe chu gang dag sogs pa de slon du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: mngal gyi gnas na gnas pa'i tshe chu gang dag sogs pa de slon du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: The waters that have accumulated in the womb should be drunk.

original: skye dgu'i bdag po'i cho ga yis //
analyzed: skye dgu'i bdag po'i cho ga yis //
translated: Then, by the rite of the Lord of Beings,

original: btsas pa'i cho ga byed du gzhug / ces bya ba la /
analyzed: btsas pa'i cho ga byed du gzhug / ces bya ba la /
translated: have the rite of birth performed.🔽Then, by the rite explained by the Lord of Beings, have the rite of birth explained in the secret words of the Veda performed.

original: de nas skye dgu'i bdag pos bshad pa'i cho ga rig byed kyi gsang tshig las bshad pa'i btsas pa'i cho ga byed du gzhug go / snying la gnas pa'i rtsa rnams ni //
analyzed: de nas skye dgu'i bdag pos bshad pa'i cho ga rig byed kyi gsang tshig las bshad pa'i btsas pa'i cho ga byed du gzhug go / snying la gnas pa'i rtsa rnams ni //
translated: The channels in the heart

original: btsas nas kha ni dbye ba'i phyir //
analyzed: btsas nas kha ni dbye ba'i phyir //
translated: are opened by the birth

original: nyi ma gsum pa 'am bzhi pa la //
analyzed: nyi ma gsum pa 'am bzhi pa la //
translated: on the third or fourth day,

original: bud med kyi ni nu zho 'byung //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bud med kyi ni nu zho 'byung // zhes bya ba la /
translated: the milk of the woman appears.

original: bud med bu btsas pa'i snying la gnas pa'i rtsa rnams btsas pa'i dbang gis kha dbye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bud med bu btsas pa'i snying la gnas pa'i rtsa rnams btsas pa'i dbang gis kha dbye ba'i phyir /
translated: By the power of birth, the channels in the heart of the woman who has given birth are opened.

original: btsas nas nyi ma gsum mam bzhi pa la nu zho 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: btsas nas nyi ma gsum mam bzhi pa la nu zho 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: After three or four days, milk will appear.

original: de nas nyin zhag dang po la //
analyzed: de nas nyin zhag dang po la //
translated: Then, on the first day,

original: dus gsum du ni sbrang rtsi mar //
analyzed: dus gsum du ni sbrang rtsi mar //
translated: in the three periods of the day,🔽with clarified butter and honey

original: byi tsher ba dang sbyar ba la //
analyzed: byi tsher ba dang sbyar ba la //
translated: mixed with asafoetida,

original: sngags kyis btab ste byis par sbyin //🔽zhes bya ba la /🔽gang gi phyir de ltar de nyin zhag dang po la byi tsher ba dang sbyar ba'i mar dang sbrang rtsi la sngags kyis btab ste /
analyzed: sngags kyis btab ste byis par sbyin // zhes bya ba la / gang gi phyir de ltar de nyin zhag dang po la byi tsher ba dang sbyar ba'i mar dang sbrang rtsi la sngags kyis btab ste /
translated: enchanted with the spell, give it to the child.

original: byis pa la dus gsum du sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: byis pa la dus gsum du sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Thus, on the first day, in the three periods of the day, give the child clarified butter and honey mixed with asafoetida, enchanted with the spell.

original: gnyis pa dang ni gsum pa la ;🔽/ lakshi ma dang bskol mar blud //
analyzed: gnyis pa dang ni gsum pa la ; / lakshi ma dang bskol mar blud //
translated: On the second and third days,

original: ces bya ba la /🔽btsas nas nyi ma gnyis pa la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la / btsas nas nyi ma gnyis pa la /
translated: give it with lakṣmaṇa and boiled ghee.

original: la kshi ma zhes bya ba'i sman dang bskol ba'i mar la sngags kyis btab pa dus gsum du ni sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: la kshi ma zhes bya ba'i sman dang bskol ba'i mar la sngags kyis btab pa dus gsum du ni sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Thus, on the second day after birth, give it in the three periods of the day with lakṣmaṇa herb and boiled ghee, enchanted with the spell.

original: nyi ma gsum pa la yang mar de nyid la sngags kyis btab pa dus @91b gsum du sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma gsum pa la yang mar de nyid la sngags kyis btab pa dus @91b gsum du sbyin par bya'o //
translated: On the third day, give the same ghee, enchanted with the spell, in the three periods of the day.

original: de nas dang po'i nu zho ni //
analyzed: de nas dang po'i nu zho ni //
translated: Then, the first milk

original: bkag pa de la mar sar ni //🔽zho gnyis tsam gyi tshad sbyin zhing //
analyzed: bkag pa de la mar sar ni // zho gnyis tsam gyi tshad sbyin zhing //
translated: is prohibited. To that child,🔽give ghee, the measure of two finger-joints,

original: nu zho dus gnyis blud par bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nu zho dus gnyis blud par bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: and give milk at two times.

original: de'i 'og tu dang por nu zho mi blud par bkag pa'i byis pa da la mar sar zho gnyis tsam gyi tshod byin la /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dang por nu zho mi blud par bkag pa'i byis pa da la mar sar zho gnyis tsam gyi tshod byin la /
translated: After that, first, to the child for whom milk is prohibited, give ghee, the measure of two finger-joints.

original: de'i rjes la nu zho sngags kyis btab la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la nu zho sngags kyis btab la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: After that, give milk, consecrated with a mantra.

original: ma nyid kyi ni nu zho blud //
analyzed: ma nyid kyi ni nu zho blud //
translated: The mother herself should give milk,

original: de yi lus ni 'phel byed yin //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de yi lus ni 'phel byed yin // zhes bya ba la /
translated: for that increases the child's body.

original: nu zho de yang ma kho na'i blud par bya'o //
analyzed: nu zho de yang ma kho na'i blud par bya'o //
translated: That milk should be given by the mother herself.

original: gzhan gyi blud par mi bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi blud par mi bya ste /
translated: It should not be given by another.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ma'i 'o ma de ni byis pa'i lus 'phel zhing rgyas par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: ma'i 'o ma de ni byis pa'i lus 'phel zhing rgyas par byed pa yin no //
translated: The mother's milk increases and expands the child's body.

original: de med ma ma shin tu byams //
analyzed: de med ma ma shin tu byams //
translated: Without that, a very loving wet-nurse,🔽faultless, abstaining from sex,

original: skyon med 'khrig pa spangs pa dang // rigs dang rang bzhin de dang mnyam //
analyzed: skyon med 'khrig pa spangs pa dang // rigs dang rang bzhin de dang mnyam //
translated: of similar caste and nature,

original: nad med na tshod dar la bab //
analyzed: nad med na tshod dar la bab //
translated: healthy, in the prime of youth,

original: bu ma shi zhing brkam chags med //🔽gnyis kyi 'o ma blud par bya //
analyzed: bu ma shi zhing brkam chags med // gnyis kyi 'o ma blud par bya //
translated: The child should not die, nor should the nurse be greedy.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Two nurses should be appointed, and they should give the child their milk.

original: ma'i 'o ma de med par gyur na /
analyzed: ma'i 'o ma de med par gyur na /
translated: If the mother’s milk is not available,

original: ma ma byis pa la shin tu byams shing brtse ba la lus la skyon med cing 'on pa dang zhar ba ma yin zhing yan lag ma tshang ba med pa dang / 'khrig pa spangs shing skyes pa dang nyal po spong ba dang / rigs dang rang bzhin byis pa de dang mnyam pa dang /
analyzed: ma ma byis pa la shin tu byams shing brtse ba la lus la skyon med cing 'on pa dang zhar ba ma yin zhing yan lag ma tshang ba med pa dang / 'khrig pa spangs shing skyes pa dang nyal po spong ba dang / rigs dang rang bzhin byis pa de dang mnyam pa dang /
translated: two nurses should be appointed. They should be very loving and caring for the child, free of physical defects, not deaf or blind, not lacking any limbs, and should have abandoned sexual activity. They should be of the same social class and nature as the child.

original: nad med cing bde bar gnas pa dang / dar la bab cing byis pa dang rgas pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: nad med cing bde bar gnas pa dang / dar la bab cing byis pa dang rgas pa ma yin pa /
translated: They should be healthy and well-off, neither too young nor too old.

original: sngon chad bu shi ma myong zhing bu 'tsho ba dang / brkam chags kyi zhen pa chung ba'i ma ma gnyis bskos la /🔽de'i 'o ma blud par bya'o //
analyzed: sngon chad bu shi ma myong zhing bu 'tsho ba dang / brkam chags kyi zhen pa chung ba'i ma ma gnyis bskos la / de'i 'o ma blud par bya'o //
translated: They should not have previously lost a child, and should have a child of their own who is alive. They should be less attached and greedy.

original: de gnyis zas dang spyod lam ni //
analyzed: de gnyis zas dang spyod lam ni //
translated: These two nurses should be appointed, and they should give the child their milk.

original: phan pas 'bad de gso bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: phan pas 'bad de gso bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: The child should be carefully nourished with beneficial food and conduct.

original: ma ma gnyis zas dang spyod lam phan zhing gnod pa med pa dag gi 'bad bas gso zhing bsnyen bkur bya'o //
analyzed: ma ma gnyis zas dang spyod lam phan zhing gnod pa med pa dag gi 'bad bas gso zhing bsnyen bkur bya'o //
translated: The two nurses should nourish and serve the child with food and conduct that is beneficial and not harmful.

original: mya ngan khro dang smyung ba dang // lus dub nu zho nyams pa'i rgyu //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mya ngan khro dang smyung ba dang // lus dub nu zho nyams pa'i rgyu // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Sorrow, anger, fasting, and exhausting the body are causes of loss of breast milk.

original: mya ngan la sogs pa ni bud med kyi nu zho nyams shing 'jig pa'i rgyu yin pas de dag kyang spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: mya ngan la sogs pa ni bud med kyi nu zho nyams shing 'jig pa'i rgyu yin pas de dag kyang spang bar bya'o //
translated: Sorrow and so forth are causes of loss and destruction of a woman's breast milk. Therefore, those should also be abandoned.

original: bu ram chang ma gtogs chang dang // rlan can sha khu 'o ma dang // 'o ma can sman mya ngan sogs //
analyzed: bu ram chang ma gtogs chang dang // rlan can sha khu 'o ma dang // 'o ma can sman mya ngan sogs //
translated: Except for molasses beer, beer, watery broths, milk, and milk-producing medicines,

original: go bzlog nu zho'i rgyu yin no //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: go bzlog nu zho'i rgyu yin no // zhes bya ba la /
translated: are causes of breast milk, when reversed.

original: nu zho'i rgyu ni bu ram chang ma gtogs pa'i chang dang / @92a * //
analyzed: nu zho'i rgyu ni bu ram chang ma gtogs pa'i chang dang / @92a * //
translated: The causes of breast milk are beer except for molasses beer,

original: rlan can gyi srog chags kyi sha khu dang / 'o ma dang / 'o ma can gyi sman dzi ban ti la sogs pa dang / mya ngan la sogs pa las go bzlog pa ste sems dga' ba dang / 'grangs par za ba dang lus dub par ma gyur pa ni /
analyzed: rlan can gyi srog chags kyi sha khu dang / 'o ma dang / 'o ma can gyi sman dzi ban ti la sogs pa dang / mya ngan la sogs pa las go bzlog pa ste sems dga' ba dang / 'grangs par za ba dang lus dub par ma gyur pa ni /
translated: The causes of breast milk are:🔽the soup of moist animals, milk, milk-producing medicines, joyfulness, eating in moderation, and not exhausting the body.

original: nu zho'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: nu zho'i rgyu yin no //
translated: These are the causes of breast milk.

original: de bas na de dag ni sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de dag ni sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, these should be given.🔽Food that is incompatible, hunger, a depressed mind,

original: mi mthun zas ni zos pa dang // ltogs dang sems ni nyams pa dang // lus zungs gnod bcas sbrum ma yi //
analyzed: mi mthun zas ni zos pa dang // ltogs dang sems ni nyams pa dang // lus zungs gnod bcas sbrum ma yi //
translated: and bodily humors that are impaired, a pregnant woman,

original: 'o ma byis pa'i nad skyed byed //
analyzed: 'o ma byis pa'i nad skyed byed //
translated: milk, and a child produce illness.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: In this verse,

original: ma 'am / ma mas kha zas mi mthun zhing 'phrod pa ma yin pa zos pa dang / de bzhin du ltogs shing bkres par gyur pa dang / sems nyams shing brgyal bar gyur pa dang / lus zungs rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang bcas pa dang /
analyzed: ma 'am / ma mas kha zas mi mthun zhing 'phrod pa ma yin pa zos pa dang / de bzhin du ltogs shing bkres par gyur pa dang / sems nyams shing brgyal bar gyur pa dang / lus zungs rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang bcas pa dang /
translated: a mother or wet nurse eats food that is incompatible and unsuitable, and likewise becomes hungry and starved, her mind becomes depressed and faint, and her bodily humors are impaired by wind and so forth.

original: sbrum ma'i nu zho gang yin pa de ni byis pa'i nad skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sbrum ma'i nu zho gang yin pa de ni byis pa'i nad skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: The milk of a pregnant woman is a cause of disease for the child.

original: nu zho med na ra 'am ba'i //🔽'o ma bri ha ti sogs rtsa 'am //
analyzed: nu zho med na ra 'am ba'i // 'o ma bri ha ti sogs rtsa 'am //
translated: If there is no breast milk,🔽one should give the milk of a goat or a cow,

original: sti ra gnyis bskol kha rar bcas //
analyzed: sti ra gnyis bskol kha rar bcas //
translated: boiled with the five major and five minor roots,🔽and with sugar,

original: yon tan de ldan blud par bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yon tan de ldan blud par bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: having the qualities of mother’s milk.

original: gal te ma 'am ma ma'i nu zho med par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te ma 'am ma ma'i nu zho med par gyur na /
translated: If the mother or wet nurse has no breast milk,

original: byis pa la ba 'am ra'i 'o ma bri ha ti la sogs pa rtsa ba chen po lnga dang / chung ngu lnga dang bskol ba 'am /
analyzed: byis pa la ba 'am ra'i 'o ma bri ha ti la sogs pa rtsa ba chen po lnga dang / chung ngu lnga dang bskol ba 'am /
translated: one should give the child the milk of a goat or a cow, boiled with the five major and five minor roots,

original: yang na ba 'am /
analyzed: yang na ba 'am /
translated: or else the milk of a goat or a cow,

original: ra'i 'o ma sti ra gnyis po ste /
analyzed: ra'i 'o ma sti ra gnyis po ste /
translated: boiled with the two types of sugar,

original: sa la parni dang / krishna pa rni dang bskol ba 'am /
analyzed: sa la parni dang / krishna pa rni dang bskol ba 'am /
translated: sugar from sugarcane and sugar from grapes,

original: kha ra dang bcas pa ma'i 'o ma'i yon tan dang bcas pa blud par bya'o //
analyzed: kha ra dang bcas pa ma'i 'o ma'i yon tan dang bcas pa blud par bya'o //
translated: and with sugar, having the qualities of mother’s milk.

original: drug pa'i mtshan mor khyad par du //🔽bsrung dang gtor ma'i bya ba bya //
analyzed: drug pa'i mtshan mor khyad par du // bsrung dang gtor ma'i bya ba bya //
translated: On the sixth night,🔽one should perform the rites of protection and bali offerings,

original: de yi gnyen gyis mel tse bya //
analyzed: de yi gnyen gyis mel tse bya //
translated: and the relatives should keep watch.

original: shin tu dga' ba nyid kyang bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: shin tu dga' ba nyid kyang bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should also be very joyful.

original: btsas nas nyi ma drug pa'i mtshan mo la bab pa na mchog gam khyad par du bsrung ba'i sbyor ba ji snyed pa rnams bya ba dang / gtor ma'i cho ga bya ba dang / de'i nye du'i skye bo rnams kyis mtshan mo mel tshe bya zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rol mo sna tshogs kyang bya'o //
analyzed: btsas nas nyi ma drug pa'i mtshan mo la bab pa na mchog gam khyad par du bsrung ba'i sbyor ba ji snyed pa rnams bya ba dang / gtor ma'i cho ga bya ba dang / de'i nye du'i skye bo rnams kyis mtshan mo mel tshe bya zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rol mo sna tshogs kyang bya'o //
translated: and the relatives of the newborn should keep watch at night and perform various kinds of entertainment.🔽When ten days have passed,

original: zhag bcu rdzogs par gyur pa dang // rang rigs 'tsham pa'i cho ga ni //🔽byed du gzhug cing btsas ma bslang //
analyzed: zhag bcu rdzogs par gyur pa dang // rang rigs 'tsham pa'i cho ga ni // byed du gzhug cing btsas ma bslang //
translated: one should have the rite appropriate to one's caste performed,🔽and the birth should be announced.🔽On the body, one should apply red arsenic,

original: lus la ldong ros ba bla dang // gi wam @92b tsandan aa kar gdags //🔽rgyu skar lha 'am nye du las //
analyzed: lus la ldong ros ba bla dang // gi wam @92b tsandan aa kar gdags // rgyu skar lha 'am nye du las //
translated: camphor, betel nut, and sandalwood.🔽From the deity of the lunar mansion or from a relative,

original: dras pa'i yi ge mnyam pa yi //
analyzed: dras pa'i yi ge mnyam pa yi //
translated: one should take🔽a piece of cloth🔽and a name

original: ming ni byis pa la gdags bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ming ni byis pa la gdags bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: for the child.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: As it is said:

original: wa la sogs pa'i gcin la sogs ba dang sbyar ba'i spos kyis bdugs pa la sogs pa byas na yang smyo byed kyi nad la phan no //
analyzed: wa la sogs pa'i gcin la sogs ba dang sbyar ba'i spos kyis bdugs pa la sogs pa byas na yang smyo byed kyi nad la phan no //
translated: Incense and so forth prepared with fox and so on urine are also helpful in the case of insanity.

original: bad kan rlung gyur la phal cher //🔽khyi dang ba glang nya sha ni //
analyzed: bad kan rlung gyur la phal cher // khyi dang ba glang nya sha ni //
translated: For phlegm-type and wind-type [insanity], [use] mostly🔽dog, ox, and fish

original: rul ba'i dud pas bdug par bya //
analyzed: rul ba'i dud pas bdug par bya //
translated: meat, and smoke from rotting [things].

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: This is what it says.

original: bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i smyo byed phal cher la ni khyi dang ba glang dang nya'i sha rul zhing dri mnam pa'i dud pas nad pa de la bdugs na phan no //
analyzed: bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i smyo byed phal cher la ni khyi dang ba glang dang nya'i sha rul zhing dri mnam pa'i dud pas nad pa de la bdugs na phan no //
translated: For most phlegm-type and wind-type insanity, it is helpful to fumigate the patient with the smoke of rotting dog, ox, and fish meat, which has a foul smell.

original: mkhris gyur la ni tig ta'i mar //
analyzed: mkhris gyur la ni tig ta'i mar //
translated: For bile-type [insanity], use Tikta oil,

original: 'tsho byed snum ni gnyis kyi mar //
analyzed: 'tsho byed snum ni gnyis kyi mar //
translated: Jivaka oil, and the oil of the two fats.🔽Cold, sweet, and light food and drink

original: bza' dang btung ba bsil ba dang // mngar ba dang ni yang ba bsngags //
analyzed: bza' dang btung ba bsil ba dang // mngar ba dang ni yang ba bsngags //
translated: are recommended.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: This is what it says.

original: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i smyo byed la ni tig ta'i sman mar dang / mar dang / til mar gnyis kyi sman mar blud na phan pa dang / de bzhin du bza' ba dang btung ba sil ba dang / mngar ba dang yang ba'i bag bsten pa bsngags pa yin no //
analyzed: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i smyo byed la ni tig ta'i sman mar dang / mar dang / til mar gnyis kyi sman mar blud na phan pa dang / de bzhin du bza' ba dang btung ba sil ba dang / mngar ba dang yang ba'i bag bsten pa bsngags pa yin no //
translated: For bile-type insanity, it is helpful to administer the medicine oil of Tikta, ghee, and the medicine oil of the two fats of sesame oil and mustard oil, and likewise, it is recommended to rely on cold, sweet, and light food and drink.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i gtar ga gdab //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i gtar ga gdab //
translated: Perform bloodletting as explained.

original: yang na sha tshon gyis 'grangs bya //
analyzed: yang na sha tshon gyis 'grangs bya //
translated: Or else, he should be made to fast on meat.

original: de 'og rlung med gnas bsnyal nas //
analyzed: de 'og rlung med gnas bsnyal nas //
translated: Then, he should be laid in a windless place.

original: sems myos ba las thar bar 'gyur /🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sems myos ba las thar bar 'gyur / zhes bya ba la /
translated: He will be freed from the madness of the mind.

original: sngar mdo'i gnas su smyo byed la ni snying ga dang / mig zur dang / dpral bar gtar ga gdab par bshad pa'i cho gas gtar ga gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: sngar mdo'i gnas su smyo byed la ni snying ga dang / mig zur dang / dpral bar gtar ga gdab par bshad pa'i cho gas gtar ga gdab par bya'o //
translated: In the chapter on the sutras, it was explained that for the treatment of insanity, bloodletting should be performed at the heart, the corner of the eye, and the forehead.

original: yang na sha tshon gyis 'grangs par byas la /
analyzed: yang na sha tshon gyis 'grangs par byas la /
translated: Or else, he should be made to fast on meat.

original: de'i 'og khang ba rlung med pa'i gnas su bsnyal na /
analyzed: de'i 'og khang ba rlung med pa'i gnas su bsnyal na /
translated: Then, he should be laid in a windless place.

original: sems myos shing 'khrul ba'i nad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems myos shing 'khrul ba'i nad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be freed from the madness and confusion of the mind.🔽The water in a well should be reduced,

original: khron pa'i chu ni nyung bar gzhug / ltogs pa nyid du byas te bskam //🔽zhes bya ba la /🔽yang na smyo byed kyis zin pa'i nad pa de khron pa'am /
analyzed: khron pa'i chu ni nyung bar gzhug / ltogs pa nyid du byas te bskam // zhes bya ba la / yang na smyo byed kyis zin pa'i nad pa de khron pa'am /
translated: and he should be made to fast and be dried out.🔽Or else, the patient seized by insanity should be placed in a well or a pond with little water,

original: rdzing bu chu nyung bar bcug la ltogs pa nyid du byas nas lus bskams na yang phan no //🔽de la chos dang nor ldan pa'i //
analyzed: rdzing bu chu nyung bar bcug la ltogs pa nyid du byas nas lus bskams na yang phan no //🔽de la chos dang nor ldan pa'i //
translated: and he should be made to fast and be dried out. This will also be beneficial.🔽For the treatment of insanity,

original: gtam dang mdza' bos dga' bar bya //
analyzed: gtam dang mdza' bos dga' bar bya //
translated: And by conversation and friendship.🔽

original: zhes bya ba la /🔽yang na smyo byed dang ldan pa'i nad pa de la de'i snying du sdug pa'i mdza' bos chos dang nor dang ldan pa'i gtam snyan pas de'i sems dga' bar bya zhing spro ba sring bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la / yang na smyo byed dang ldan pa'i nad pa de la de'i snying du sdug pa'i mdza' bos chos dang nor dang ldan pa'i gtam snyan pas de'i sems dga' bar bya zhing spro ba sring bar bya'o //
translated: He should be gladdened by talk and by friends.🔽Or, he should be gladdened by talk of Dharma and wealth, by pleasant words from a dear friend who is dear to his heart.

original: yang na sdug pa dang bral ba 'am //
analyzed: yang na sdug pa dang bral ba 'am //
translated: Or, he should be gladdened by talk of separation from a loved one,

original: @121a * // rmad du byung ba bstan par bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: @121a * // rmad du byung ba bstan par bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: or by the teaching of marvels.

original: yang nad pa de la yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa dang bral ba'i gtam sems dngangs par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: yang nad pa de la yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa dang bral ba'i gtam sems dngangs par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Or, he should be gladdened by talk of separation from a loved one, which will cause his mind to be alarmed.

original: yang na ngo mtshar skye zhing rmad du gyur pa'i dngos po bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na ngo mtshar skye zhing rmad du gyur pa'i dngos po bstan par bya'o //
translated: Or, he should be gladdened by the teaching of marvelous and amazing things.

original: bcings la yungs mar gyis bskus te /
analyzed: bcings la yungs mar gyis bskus te /
translated: He should be anointed with mustard oil,🔽and laid out in the sun,

original: nyi tshan la ni gan rkyal bzhag / kha sral phre'u'am lcags tsha ba'am //
analyzed: nyi tshan la ni gan rkyal bzhag / kha sral phre'u'am lcags tsha ba'am //
translated: or touched with a hot iron or a heated copper plate,

original: til mar chu tshan gyis reg bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: til mar chu tshan gyis reg bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: or with hot oil or hot water.

original: yang na smyo byed can de bcings la /
analyzed: yang na smyo byed can de bcings la /
translated: Or, he should be bound and

original: yungs mar gyis lus bskus te /
analyzed: yungs mar gyis lus bskus te /
translated: Or else, anoint his body with mustard oil,

original: nyi tshan la lus gan rkyal du bzhag ste /🔽kha sral phre'u lus la reg par byas pa 'am ;
analyzed: nyi tshan la lus gan rkyal du bzhag ste / kha sral phre'u lus la reg par byas pa 'am ;
translated: and lay him in the sun on his back,🔽and have him touched with a burning crowbar,

original: yang na lcags dang til mar dang / chu tsha bas lus la bsreg par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na lcags dang til mar dang / chu tsha bas lus la bsreg par bya'o //
translated: or else burn his body with hot iron, oil, and water.

original: yang na lcag gis gzhus nas ni //
analyzed: yang na lcag gis gzhus nas ni //
translated: Or else, having beaten him with whips,

original: bcings te g-yang sar skyur bar bya //
analyzed: bcings te g-yang sar skyur bar bya //
translated: bind him and throw him into a ravine.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for the last,

original: yang nad pa de lcag gis gzhus la bcings te nyam nga ba'i g-yang sar skyur bas sdang bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang nad pa de lcag gis gzhus la bcings te nyam nga ba'i g-yang sar skyur bas sdang bar bya'o //
translated: you should beat the patient with whips, bind him, and throw him into a terrifying ravine.

original: yang na rdo dang mtshon med pa'i //
analyzed: yang na rdo dang mtshon med pa'i //
translated: Or else, in a dark room without stones or weapons,

original: mun khang mi ni med par bzhag / ces bya ba la /
analyzed: mun khang mi ni med par bzhag / ces bya ba la /
translated: leave him there without any other people.

original: yang na rdo dang mtshon cha med pa'i khang pa mun nag du gyur pa mi med pa dag tu gzhag par bya'o //🔽mche ba bton pa'i sbrul dang ni //🔽glang dang seng ge glang po ches //
analyzed: yang na rdo dang mtshon cha med pa'i khang pa mun nag du gyur pa mi med pa dag tu gzhag par bya'o // mche ba bton pa'i sbrul dang ni // glang dang seng ge glang po ches //
translated: Or else, in a dark room without stones or weapons, leave him there without any other people.🔽Or else, frighten him with snakes whose fangs have been drawn,

original: de ni skrag tu gzhug pa 'am //
analyzed: de ni skrag tu gzhug pa 'am //
translated: or with elephants, lions, and bulls.

original: yang na rgyal po'i skyes bu yis //
analyzed: yang na rgyal po'i skyes bu yis //
translated: Or else, have him seized by the king’s men🔽and

original: dam du bcings te phyir phyung na //
analyzed: dam du bcings te phyir phyung na //
translated: When he is bound tightly and dragged out,🔽he is terrified by the king’s order:

original: rgyal po'i bka' yis bsdigs pa dang // 'di gsad bya zhes skrag tu gzhug / ces bya ba la /🔽yang na smyo byed can gyi nad pa de mche ba bton zhing med par byas pa'i sbrul lam glang khyu mchog gam /
analyzed: rgyal po'i bka' yis bsdigs pa dang // 'di gsad bya zhes skrag tu gzhug / ces bya ba la / yang na smyo byed can gyi nad pa de mche ba bton zhing med par byas pa'i sbrul lam glang khyu mchog gam /
translated: “He will be killed!”

original: seng ge la sogs pas skrag tu gzhug par bya ba'am /
analyzed: seng ge la sogs pas skrag tu gzhug par bya ba'am /
translated: Or, the patient who is possessed by a spirit is terrified by a snake, an elephant, a bull, a lion, etc., whose fangs have been removed and which are not real.

original: yang na nad pa de rgyal po'i mngag gzhug gi skye bos dam du bcings te /
analyzed: yang na nad pa de rgyal po'i mngag gzhug gi skye bos dam du bcings te /
translated: Or, the patient is bound tightly by the king’s servants,

original: rgyal po'i bkas bsdigs pa dang gsad pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis skrag tu gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyal po'i bkas bsdigs pa dang gsad pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis skrag tu gzhug par bya'o //
translated: and is terrified by the king’s order, by the words “He will be killed,” etc.

original: lus kyi sdug bsngal 'jigs pa bas //
analyzed: lus kyi sdug bsngal 'jigs pa bas //
translated: The fear of the suffering of the body is removed,

original: srog gi 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pas //
analyzed: srog gi 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pas //
translated: and the fear of the suffering of life is completely removed.

original: de phyir kun tu 'khrul pa'i yid //
analyzed: de phyir kun tu 'khrul pa'i yid //
translated: Therefore, the mind which is completely confused

original: nye bar zhi ba nyid du 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba nyid du 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: becomes completely pacified.

original: gang gi phyir lus kyi sdug bsngal bsreg pa dang brdeg pa dang / gzir ba la sogs pa las srog gi 'jigs pa rab tu 'jigs shing skrag par byed pa yin pas rgyu de'i phyir srog dang @121b bral ba'i 'jigs pas smyo byed kyis kun tu 'khrul par byed pa'i yid nye bar zhi zhing med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir lus kyi sdug bsngal bsreg pa dang brdeg pa dang / gzir ba la sogs pa las srog gi 'jigs pa rab tu 'jigs shing skrag par byed pa yin pas rgyu de'i phyir srog dang @121b bral ba'i 'jigs pas smyo byed kyis kun tu 'khrul par byed pa'i yid nye bar zhi zhing med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because bodily suffering, such as burning, beating, and piercing, causes fear for one’s life, and that fear is terrifying. For that reason, the mind that is confused by the fear of losing one’s life becomes pacified and ceases to exist.

original: grub pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni //🔽nad dmigs dus sogs ltos te bya //
analyzed: grub pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni // nad dmigs dus sogs ltos te bya //
translated: These established applications

original: zhes bya ba la /🔽de ltar sngar bshad pa'i gso ba'i sbyor ba grub par gyur pa 'di dag ni nad dmigs dang dus la sogs pa la ltos nas spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la / de ltar sngar bshad pa'i gso ba'i sbyor ba grub par gyur pa 'di dag ni nad dmigs dang dus la sogs pa la ltos nas spyad par bya'o //
translated: should be used in relation to the time of the diagnosis of the illness, and so forth.

original: sdug dang nor dang bral ba las //
analyzed: sdug dang nor dang bral ba las //
translated: Thus, these established applications of healing, which were explained above, should be used in relation to the time of the diagnosis of the illness, and so forth.

original: gang gi yid la gnod gyur pa //
analyzed: gang gi yid la gnod gyur pa //
translated: When someone’s mind is afflicted🔽by the loss of a loved one or wealth,

original: de la de 'dra rnyed gyur pa //
analyzed: de la de 'dra rnyed gyur pa //
translated: that person should be healed

original: spro bsrings dbugs dbyung pa yis gso //
analyzed: spro bsrings dbugs dbyung pa yis gso //
translated: by the encouragement of hope and relief.
